医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新工具预测乳腺癌治疗造成的神经损伤风险许多使用紫杉烷类药物（一种细胞抑制药物）治疗乳腺癌的女性经常会出现神经系统副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-tool-predicts-nerve-damage-risk-from-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-tool-predicts-nerve-damage-risk-from-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=760f9d1b-5616-4b95-92fa-0dffa8426b90 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:46:38 -0400 New tool predicts nerve damage risk from breast cancer treatment
研究强调女性新兵缺铁率显着增加经过五个月的基础军事训练后，女新兵缺铁的比例增加了一倍多，从25%增加到55%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-highlights-marked-increase-in-iron-deficiency-among-female-military-recruits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-highlights-marked-increase-in-iron-deficiency-among-female-military-recruits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bd00b19-66df-4e55-814c-4d83b48d0e1b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:37:38 -0400 Study highlights marked increase in iron deficiency among female military recruits
妊娠携带者的孕产妇发病率和妊娠风险较高根据今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上公布的新研究，与自然受孕或通过体外受精 (IVF) 受孕的女性相比，代孕妈妈（也称为代孕妈妈）发生严重孕产妇疾病和不良妊娠结局的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Maternal-morbidity-and-pregnancy-risks-higher-for-gestational-riers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Maternal-morbidity-and-pregnancy-risks-higher-for-gestational-riers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eab8c3f8-76cf-4c59-8a7c-77aef1fb2bb6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:19:04 -0400 Maternal morbidity and pregnancy risks higher for gestational carriers
女军人和女性家庭成员面临更高的慢性疼痛风险布莱根妇女医院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，女军人和女性家庭成员患慢性疼痛的风险明显更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Military-women-and-female-family-members-face-higher-risks-of-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Military-women-and-female-family-members-face-higher-risks-of-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1892fb63-be47-45eb-b04d-f6a9129f6d9c Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:10:44 -0400 Military women and female family members face higher risks of chronic pain
了解医药促销活动在医疗保健领域的影响力由制药行业主办的针对负责处方药物的卫生专业人员（例如医生和执业护士）的促销活动是新药和设备促销活动的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-reach-of-pharmaceutical-promotional-events-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-reach-of-pharmaceutical-promotional-events-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=477e6db9-deee-43b2-9e42-c2c93547cb01 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:04:33 -0400 Understanding the reach of pharmaceutical promotional events in healthcare
密切合作帮助患有癌症的儿童Paul Scherrer 研究所 PSI 和苏黎世大学儿童医院之间的密切合作始于 20 年前，旨在造福癌症儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/A-close-collaboration-to-help-children-suffering-from-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/A-close-collaboration-to-help-children-suffering-from-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af5c7864-77ae-4e0f-b7ba-e1269b16533d Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:45:29 -0400 A close collaboration to help children suffering from cancer
世卫组织推出医疗器械信息在线平台世界卫生组织 (WHO) 推出了一个名为 MeDevIS（医疗器械信息系统）的在线平台，这是第一个全球开放式医疗器械信息交换所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/WHO-launches-an-online-platform-for-information-on-medical-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/WHO-launches-an-online-platform-for-information-on-medical-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=263f66a9-c3f8-499c-84f9-915343b0e88b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:31:34 -0400 WHO launches an online platform for information on medical devices
阻断大脑中的 IL-6 可治疗癌症恶病质癌症是阴险的。在整个肿瘤进展过程中，该疾病会劫持其他健康的生物过程（如人体的免疫反应）来生长和扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Blocking-IL-6-in-the-brain-to-treat-cancer-cachexia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Blocking-IL-6-in-the-brain-to-treat-cancer-cachexia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb807831-449d-4ad4-8003-b488441dc79b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:23:39 -0400 Blocking IL-6 in the brain to treat cancer cachexia
研究表明脉冲场消融治疗房颤患者的安全性由西奈山伊坎医学院领导的同类新技术的最大规模研究表明，脉冲场消融 (PFA) 对于治疗常见类型的心房颤动 (AF) 患者是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-shows-safety-of-pulsed-field-ablation-for-treating-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-shows-safety-of-pulsed-field-ablation-for-treating-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb1bfc5-c304-4294-b34b-8d3ef4f722af Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:16:38 -0400 Study shows safety of pulsed field ablation for treating patients with atrial fibrillation
了解血小板-单核细胞相互作用以改善免疫疾病的治疗单核细胞是一种特殊类型的白细胞，分泌细胞因子作为炎症信使，这对于适当的免疫反应至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-platelet-mon Bathroom-interaction-to-improve-treatment-of-immune-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-platelet-monogenic-interaction-to-improve-treatment-of-immune-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d091c5ac-6495-49d0-bf4f-1d733a8a31b8 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:02:00 -0400 Understanding the platelet-monocyte interaction to improve treatment of immune disorders
